availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William A. Nisbet (Hopkins Co., KY, livery stable keeper)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, keeper of livery stable. Kentucky native. Son of James Nisbet and Mary A. Nisbet. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Livery stable keeper in Hopkins County in 1860. Livery stable keeper in Hopkins County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 1, p. 49B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Madisonville, p. 835.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Hopkins County, KY, August 1863, p. 143 (Accessed via ancestry.com).
"William Alexander Nisbet (2 Jan 1833-16 Jul 1910),"Find A Grave, Memorial #118875966, accessed October 8, 2020, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/118875966.
